Works Department (North) The Executive Engineer, works Department (North) covers mountainous, extremely remote and heavy rainfall areas. The Jurisdiction of the works Department includes the talukas of Junnar, Ambegaon, Khed, Maval, Mulshi and Bhor and Velha. Out of these, Junnar, Ambegaon whole area and some parts of Khed Maval taluka fall in the tribal area. The following 5 sub-divisions are functioning under the works Department (North). 1) Junnar and Ambegaon 2) Khed 3) Maval 4) Mulshi 5) Bhor and Velha The construction of rural roads and other district roads provided for the movement of the people in rural areas is done by repaire and maintainance the works Department North. Also, the basic facilities required by the people in rural areas are provided, e.g. internal village roads, drains, primary school buildings, anganwadi buildings, toilets, primary health centers, sub-center buildings, veterinary clinics, etc. These works are being carried out by the works Department North. Structure of the Department Works Department (North) Pune Zilla Parishad, Pune Works Department North is responsible for effective implementation of the District Annual Plan of the Zilla Parishad and various development schemes of the State Government, construction of quality roads (WBM, Earthen road, asphalting, concreting etc.), repair, expantion construction of new buildings and Also construction of sakav, C.D. works and small bridges etc. E-tendering of works, issuing work orders, checking the quality and execution of works, completing the works on time, and spending the maximum amount of grants received from the Government for development work. etc. All the works are completed on time. Services:- The following facilities are provided as per the Government of Maharashtra Government Decision No.-Sankirna-2016/Pr.No.148/Yo-9 dated 2.12.2016 under the Construction Department South 1)Educated Unemployed Engineer Registration Certificate. 2)Labour Co-operative Society Registration Certificate. 3)Independent Monopoly Registration Certificate. Forms :- 1)Educated Unemployed Engineer Registration Form. 2)Labour Co-operative Society Registration Form. 3)Independent Registered Monopolist Registration Form. Works North Department The works North Department was established on May 1962 and there are a total of 5 sub-divisions under the works North Department namely Ambegaon & Junnar, Mulshi, Maval, Khed, Bhor & Velha The statistical information regarding the rural roads and other district roads coming under the works North Department is as follows. Sr.no Taluka Name Total no. of village Road Total no. of village Road length (KM) Total no. of Other District Road Total no. of Other District Road length (KM) Total length (KM) 1 Ambegaon 320 744.76 25 285.60 1030.36 2 Junnar 416 1005.35 19 157.05 1162.40 3 Mulshi 148 379.2 18 195.70 574.90 4 Bhor 287 585.62 14 102.60 688.22 5 Maval 178 431.51 11 103.60 535.11 6 Velhe 151 289.7 5 60.20 349.90 7 Khed 260 643.55 17 160.85 804.40 рдПрдХреБрдг 1760 4079.69 109 1065.60 5145.29 Information about bridges, sakav and C.D. Works moris coming under the Jurisdiction of the Works North Department Sr.no Taluka Briges Sakav Mori Total 1 Junnar 33 0 0 33 2 Ambegaon 10 0 0 10 3 Khed 0 0 0 0 4 Maval 04 07 06 17 5 рдореБрд│рд╢реА 16 02 0 18 6 Bhor 51 0 0 51 7 Velha 13 02 0 15 Total 127 11 6 144 Works North Department , Zilla Parishad Pune The following services have been notified by the Works North Department, Zilla Parishad Pune regarding the issuance of No Objection Certificates under the Service Guarantee Act. Issuance of No Objection Certificate for making land non-agricultural. Issuance of No Objection Certificate for laying water channels along the Z.P. road. Issuance of No Objection Certificate for laying petrol pump/gas pipe line. Issuance of No Objection Certificate for laying optical fiber cable. Telephone : 020-26133485 Address : District Level Office
Works Department (North)
Works Department (North)
Works Department (North)
Works Department (North)
The Executive Engineer, works Department (North) covers mountainous, extremely remote and heavy rainfall areas. The Jurisdiction of the works Department includes the talukas of Junnar, Ambegaon, Khed, Maval, Mulshi and Bhor and Velha. Out of these, Junnar, Ambegaon whole area and some parts of Khed Maval taluka fall in the tribal area. The following 5 sub-divisions are functioning under the works Department (North). 1) Junnar and Ambegaon 2) Khed 3) Maval 4) Mulshi 5) Bhor and Velha The construction of rural roads and other district roads provided for the movement of the people in rural areas is done by repaire and maintainance the works Department North. Also, the basic facilities required by the people in rural areas are provided, e.g. internal village roads, drains, primary school buildings, anganwadi buildings, toilets, primary health centers, sub-center buildings, veterinary clinics, etc. These works are being carried out by the works Department North. Structure of the Department Works Department (North) Pune Zilla Parishad, Pune Works Department North is responsible for effective implementation of the District Annual Plan of the Zilla Parishad and various development schemes of the State Government, construction of quality roads (WBM, Earthen road, asphalting, concreting etc.), repair, expantion construction of new buildings and Also construction of sakav, C.D. works and small bridges etc. E-tendering of works, issuing work orders, checking the quality and execution of works, completing the works on time, and spending the maximum amount of grants received from the Government for development work. etc. All the works are completed on time. Services:- The following facilities are provided as per the Government of Maharashtra Government Decision No.-Sankirna-2016/Pr.No.148/Yo-9 dated 2.12.2016 under the Construction Department South 1)Educated Unemployed Engineer Registration Certificate. 2)Labour Co-operative Society Registration Certificate. 3)Independent Monopoly Registration Certificate. Forms :- 1)Educated Unemployed Engineer Registration Form. 2)Labour Co-operative Society Registration Form. 3)Independent Registered Monopolist Registration Form. The Executive Engineer, works Department (North) covers mountainous, extremely remote and heavy rainfall areas. The Jurisdiction of the works Department includes the talukas of Junnar, Ambegaon, Khed, Maval, Mulshi and Bhor and Velha. Out of these, Junnar, Ambegaon whole area and some parts of Khed Maval taluka fall in the tribal area. The following 5 sub-divisions are functioning under the works Department (North).
1) Junnar and Ambegaon
2) Khed
3) Maval
4) Mulshi
5) Bhor and Velha
The construction of rural roads and other district roads provided for the movement of the people in rural areas is done by repaire and maintainance the works Department North. Also, the basic facilities required by the people in rural areas are provided, e.g. internal village roads, drains, primary school buildings, anganwadi buildings, toilets, primary health centers, sub-center buildings, veterinary clinics, etc. These works are being carried out by the works Department North.
Structure of the Department
Works Department (North) Pune Zilla Parishad, Pune
Works Department North is responsible for effective implementation of the District Annual Plan of the Zilla Parishad and various development schemes of the State Government, construction of quality roads (WBM, Earthen road, asphalting, concreting etc.), repair, expantion construction of new buildings and Also construction of sakav, C.D. works and small bridges etc. E-tendering of works, issuing work orders, checking the quality and execution of works, completing the works on time, and spending the maximum amount of grants received from the Government for development work. etc. All the works are completed on time.
Services:-
The following facilities are provided as per the Government of Maharashtra Government Decision No.-Sankirna-2016/Pr.No.148/Yo-9 dated 2.12.2016 under the Construction Department South
1)Educated Unemployed Engineer Registration Certificate.
2)Labour Co-operative Society Registration Certificate.
3)Independent Monopoly Registration Certificate.
Forms :-
1)Educated Unemployed Engineer Registration Form.
2)Labour Co-operative Society Registration Form.
3)Independent Registered Monopolist Registration Form.
Works North Department
The works North Department was established on May 1962 and there are a total of 5 sub-divisions under the works North Department namely Ambegaon & Junnar, Mulshi, Maval, Khed, Bhor & Velha
The statistical information regarding the rural roads and other district roads coming under the works North Department is as follows.

Works North Department , Zilla Parishad Pune
The following services have been notified by the Works North Department, Zilla Parishad Pune regarding the issuance of No Objection Certificates under the Service Guarantee Act.
Issuance of No Objection Certificate for making land non-agricultural.
Issuance of No Objection Certificate for laying water channels along the Z.P. road.
Issuance of No Objection Certificate for laying petrol pump/gas pipe line.
Issuance of No Objection Certificate for laying optical fiber cable.
Telephone : 020-26133485
Address : District Level Office
